title: nannu brOvumani
sahitya:
nannu brOvumani ceppavE sItamma talli nanu brOvumani ceppavE





anupallavi



nannu brOvumani ceppu nArI shirOmaNi janakuni kUtura janani jAnakamma



caraNam 1





prakkana jEruka cekkili nokkucu cakkaga marukELi cokkiyuNDEDu vELa









caraNam 2



 

lOkAntaranguDu shrIkAnta ninu gUDi EkAntamunanEka shayyanunna vELa





caraNam 3



adrija vinutuDu bhadragirIshuDu nidramElkonu vELa nelatarO bOdhinci
